'''Fatehgunj''' is an area in the north-central of [[Vadodara]] City in the state of [[Gujarat]] in [[India]].
Fatehgunj is located close [[Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda]] & [[Sayaji Baug]], that is why it is favourite hangout place for youngsters of [[Vadodara]]. It has many University buildings, offices, commercial complexes and restaurants. Fatehgunj is one of the most happening places in [[Vadodara]] with [[Alkapuri]] to the west and [[Sayajigunj]] to its south. [[Rosary High School (Vadodara)|Rosary High School]] is on Gymkhana Road.
== Top [[Restaurant]] ==
=== Non-Veg === * Zaffran * The Appetite * Rangoli Restaurant * Kerala Restaurant * Regal The Family A C Restaurant * Millennium Restaurant * Hyderabadi Dum Biryani
=== Veg === * Bhagyodaya Restaurant * Aangan Restaurant and Cafeteria * Sankalp Restaurant * Udupi Restaurant * New Alka Restaurant
=== Chinese === * Momoman * Jojo's Restaurant
=== [[Ice cream parlor]] === * Kwality Wall's * Havmor (Near Convent of Jesus and Mary School) * Amul (Inside Kamatibaug) * Amul Parlour (Infront of 7Seas Mall )
== [[Hotel]] == * Ginger Hotel
== Special Areas == * Kamatibaug * Maharaja Sayaji Rao University * The most lively and happening street in the evening stretching from Bhagyoday restaurant to New Alka restaurant.
== [[Holy places]] == * [[EME Temple|Dakshinamurty Temple]] * [[IPC City Prayer Hall]]
== [[Movie theater]] == * INOX - Seven Seas Mall
